task.en: Apart from the beginning slide, help me create three more slides, and then navigate to slide number 2.
task.zh: 除了标题幻灯片之外，帮我再创建三张新的幻灯片，然后定位到第二页。
task.ar: باستثناء شريحة العنوان، ساعدني في إنشاء ثلاث شرائح جديدة، ثم انتقل إلى الشريحة رقم 2.
task.ja: 初めのスライドを除いて、新しいスライドを3枚追加し、2枚目のスライドに移動してください。
task.ru: Кроме начального слайда, создайте еще три новых слайда, а затем перейдите на второй слайд.

pre_command.en: osascript -e 'tell application "Pages" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Keynote" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Keynote" to activate' && sleep 5 && osascript -e 'tell application "Keynote" to make new document with properties {document theme:theme "Dynamic Waves Dark"}'
pre_command.zh: osascript -e 'tell application "Pages" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Keynote" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Keynote" to activate' && sleep 5 && osascript -e 'tell application "Keynote" to make new document with properties {document theme:theme "动态波浪（深色）"}'
pre_command.ar: osascript -e 'tell application "Pages" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Keynote" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Keynote" to activate' && sleep 5 && osascript -e 'tell application "Keynote" to make new document with properties {document theme:theme "أمواج ديناميكية داكنة"}'
pre_command.ja: osascript -e 'tell application "Pages" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Keynote" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Keynote" to activate' && sleep 5 && osascript -e 'tell application "Keynote" to make new document with properties {document theme:theme "ダイナミックウェーブ（ダーク）"}'
pre_command.ru: osascript -e 'tell application "Pages" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Keynote" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Keynote" to activate' && sleep 5 && osascript -e 'tell application "Keynote" to make new document with properties {document theme:theme "Волны, динамическая темная"}'

grading_command: osascript -e 'tell application "Keynote" to get the count of slides of the front document' | grep -q "4" 2>/dev/null && osascript -e 'tell application "Keynote" to get the slide number of the current slide of the front document' | grep -q "2" 2>/dev/null && echo "True" || echo "False"
osascript -e 'tell application "Keynote" to get the count of slides of the front document' | grep -q "4" 2>/dev/null && echo "True" || echo "False"
osascript -e 'tell application "Keynote" to get the slide number of the current slide of the front document' | grep -q "2" 2>/dev/null && echo "True" || echo "False"
